mapper.select: select d.session_no as sessionNo, d.id as drawId, d.session_id as sessionId, s2.session_name as sessionName, d.sign_id as signId, s.name as signName, g.id as groupId, g.group_name as groupName, i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName from tc_game_draw as d left join tc_sign_single as s on s.id = d.sign_id left join tc_game_session as s2 on s2.id = d.session_id left join tc_game_item as i on i.id = s.item_id left join tc_game_group as g on g.id = i.group_id where d.session_no = #{sessionNo} and d.game_id = #{gameId} order by d.sort
